components.SignInButton.js: The sign-in button component that redirects to the auth page on press.
components.PostList.js: Component to render user posts from the database.
components.CommentList.js: Component to render comments under the posts.

api.authAPI.js: Functions to call the backend authentication API.

routes.AppRoutes.js: Main routing configuration file that includes both public and protected routes.

providers.AuthProvider.js: Context provider for authentication state across the app.
